identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster aesthetics with Control Room density
Content is King: Data legibility is the primary goal
Contrast: Use light vs. dark and thin vs. thick lines to create hierarchy
Negative Space: Use whitespace to separate data clusters, not just for decoration

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, KPI values

mono.usage: IP addresses, Passwords, Serial Numbers, Logs, Code snippets

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase, text-xs, and tracking-widest
Data values (KPIs) must be large (text-3xl+) and bold
Table data must be text-sm or text-xs for density

primary.description: Slate 900 (Light Mode) / Slate 50 (Dark Mode) - Used for primary text and solid backgrounds

accent.description: Signal Blue - Used for primary buttons, active states, and links

surface.description: Slate 100 / Slate 900 - Used for sidebars and card backgrounds

border.description: Slate 200 / Slate 800 - Used for grid lines and dividers

usage_rules: Never use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Use 'Tinted Grey' rule: Neutrals should have a slight blue tint (Slate) to feel technical.
Interactive elements must have a contrast ratio of at least 3:1.
Dark mode backgrounds should be #020617 (Slate 950), not pure black.

grid_system.dashboard: Control Room Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4
grid_system.detail_view: Sidebar + Content: grid-cols-12 gap-6 (Sidebar col-span-3, Content col-span-9)
grid_system.form: Dense Form Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-x-6 gap-y-4

surface_rules: Containers should use border-collapse style layouts where possible.
Cards should have 1px borders (border-border) and NO shadow (shadow-none) by default.
Hover states on cards: border-accent/50 and shadow-sm.
Sidebars should have a solid border-r.

variants.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 border border-input shadow-none

cards.classes: border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-none rounded-sm

inputs.classes: h-9 rounded-sm border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

textures.noise: Optional: Add a subtle noise texture to the sidebar background for a 'tactile' feel.

rules: All interactive elements MUST have a data-testid attribute (kebab-case).
Ensure text contrast meets APCA standards (4.5:1 for normal text).
Focus states must be clearly visible (ring-2 ring-ring).
Do not rely on color alone for status (use icons + color).

login_background.description: Holographic Wall / Abstract Tech Background for Login Screen

instructions_to_main_agent.component_location: Use existing Shadcn components in /app/frontend/src/components/ui/. Customize them via props or utility classes rather than rewriting them.
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use React Context or simple state for this MVP. Do not introduce Redux unless necessary.
instructions_to_main_agent.api_client: Create a centralized axios instance or fetch wrapper in /app/frontend/src/lib/api.js.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_toggle: Implement a ThemeProvider that toggles a 'dark' class on the html/body element.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use the 'Control Room' grid.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable (p-6, p-8).
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid.
Do not use gradients for text or backgrounds unless specified.
